panels.description: This graph shows the volume of the selected events overlaid onto calls into the selected transactions.

A list of all unique errors in the selected time frame and filter set. Events are ordered by the following ranking: uncaught exceptions, critical exceptions (as defined in the Settings dashboard), HTTP errors ,log errors, log warnings, swallowed exceptions and caught exceptions. For events of the same type, ranking is done comparing the rate delta and then volume.
